comment.author: 33067922@N02
comment._content: What a stunning archive and collection of photos, I really enjoy viewing their collection.

comment.author: 100313834@N06
comment._content: It is to everyone’s credit that this National Register Landmark still stands to impress both residents and visitors, unlike other architectural gems the city lost, such as our once-beautiful Carnegie Library, the magnificent Graham-Fagg Department Store or the Sam Swartz building
